name: Columns Jungle HD (Windows)
description:
Columns Jungle is a remake of the classic Columns.

Just align jewels by 3 or more horizontally, vertically or diagonally.

Each piece that appears is formed by three gems that can rotate by pressing the button on the right side. Your goal is to match three or more gems of the same type at a time horizontally, vertically or diagonally.

Move the piece (with keyboard or gamepad arrows) and place it in the proper position to match the types of gems.

3 game modes:

- Arcade: Play as fast as possible before the gems reach the top of the grid
- Time trial : make the best score before time runs out
- Arcade Online multiplayer

Unlock skins & time bonus :

- Play to win credits and unlock new skins for your jewels (stars, bubbles, beans...)
- You can also unlock time bonus for Time Trial mode
